entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot correlate System.Net.Http ETW events using ActivityId #70703
  • NativeAOT won't produce a warning on simple reflection #70698
  • createdump failing to capture a dump during force quit of VSMac #70696
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.FileSystem.Tests fails on Libraries Test Run release coreclr OSX x64 Debug #70692
  • Core 6.0 HttpClient thrwoing timeput exception #70691
  • TraceEvent Formatted Message is always null #70688
  • Warnings about Requires mismatch are not produced when DAM is used #70687
  • [API Proposal]: Exposing HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 protocol error codes #70684
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Ensure that proxy ports can be configured from command line, and make the parameters discoverable #70680
    7.0.0
  • [mono] iOS - Size reduction: _mono_aot_corelib_eh_frame is twice is large on .NET 6 compared to legacy mono #70679
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `Wasm.Build.Tests.WasmTemplateTests.ConsolePublishAndRun` fails on CI, for AOT/Windows #70675
  • timeout running RegexMatchTests.Match_VaryingLengthStrings_Huge(engine: NonBacktracking) #70674
  • Large numbers of Quic tests failed when run locally #70673
  • [wasm][debugger] Side effect of setting fixed debuggerProxy port #70670
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicException #70669
    7.0.0
  • `impNormStructVal` should not retype nodes that cannot be retyped #70666
    7.0.0
  • `JIT\HardwareIntrinsics\General\Vector256` test crashes with an `SEHException` on a machine without AVX2 #70663
  • [wasm] report undisposed proxies of JSObject, ManagedObject #70660
    Future
  • ProcessStartInfo wraps quotes arround my `--option=` #70659
  • MSBuild warnings when building runtime test projects #70658
  • JIT: Tune CSE/Constant propagation to fix this SIMD example #70657
    8.0.0
  • Can get stuck in SslStream.EnsureFullTlsFrameAsync for unknown reason #70656
  • [QUIC] Call `LocalCertificateSelectionCallback` before handshake #70651
    7.0.0
  • LdapConnection - app crash on .net 6 linux #70648
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match #70645
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.StreamTests_Sync.HandleCollectionsAsync #70644
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Vector256\\Vector256_ro\\Vector256_ro.cmd #70642
  • clang 12 - no input files [Android NDK] #70640
    Future

Closed

  • `genStructPutArgUnroll` will go out of bounds on mis-sized struct loads #65937
    7.0.0
  • aspnetcore application launches very slowly with 180G nfs volume when the nfs mounted to application folder #68322
  • JIT: Control-flow guard checked interface calls should not materialize cell addresses twice #65076
    7.0.0
  • dotnet crashes in illink-sharedframework.targets step on OSX arm64 #57934
  • [wasm] build `WasmAppHost` with `UseAppHost=false` #70603
    7.0.0
  • [WASM] libICU heap-buffer-overflow #45224
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.FileSystem.Tests failing #31812
    7.0.0
  • Enable multi-register intrinsics for Arm64 #70531
    7.0.0
  • Add API to get RST_STREAM value from HTTP exceptions #43239
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient should report protocol error code when the server closes the connection #62228
    7.0.0
  • Tests failing with DirectoryNotFoundException on Browser Wasm #40536
    Future
  • API Proposal: X509AuthorityKeyIdentifierExtension #50488
    7.0.0
  • Dotnet 6.x looks weird if I see screen_number of X11 - I think that DLLImport has problem... #70623
    Future
  • MemoryMappedFile slow program termination #69365
  • Signlar 1006 error on win 2016 server when message size incresed #70647
  • [wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to be able to run projects created in WasmTemplateTests #64237
    7.0.0
  • Update XML docs for `IntPtr` and `UIntPtr` #69614
  • [API Proposal]: Add `DeleteFromJsonAsync` for `HttpClient` #65617
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add architecture PPC64le to Architecture enum #67428
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Collections.Generic.StructuralComparisons<T> #70017
    Future
  • Utf8JsonReader.TryGetDateTime throws IndexOutOfRangeException #70584
  • Expose X509SubjectAlternativeNameExtension (or a reasonable facsimilie thereof) #28771
    Future
  • SatelliteAssembliesTests.SatelliteLoadsCorrectly_FromName sometimes fails on Browser CI #43103
    7.0.0
  • Unable to get custom attributes applied to constants using MetadataLoadContext #70634
  • Perf regressions in sorting #70373
    7.0.0
  • Signlar 1006 error on win 2016 server when message size incresed #70646
  • Test failure JIT/opt/OSR/pinnedlocal/pinnedlocal.sh #70641
  • System.IO.FileSystem tests crashing intermittently in CI #70626
  • Some CNG types no longer warn or throw PNSE in .NET 7 #70637

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow child process reaping by other thread(library) #70705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [wasm][nodejs] Fix console template running with node, to always flush the output stream before exit #70704
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Support `PUTARG_STK(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on x86/Unix x64 #70702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use LastIndexOf in ZipArchiveEntry.GetFileName_Unix #70701
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Use IndexOf in WebUtility.HtmlDecode #70700
    area-System.Net
  • Do not change `gtRetClsHnd` in `impNormStructVal` #70699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Support new hot reload features from runtime #70697
    area-EnC-mono
  • [wasm] Make runtime_is_initialized promise callbacks one-shot #70694
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • fix: [Wasm] Adjust windows build #70689
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Updating HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupId to not accelerate Vector256 APIs when AVX2 is unsupported #70686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `Marshal.GetPInvokeErrorMessage()` API. #70685
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix Debug configuration builds #70683
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • fix: [Wasm] Add missing libicudata.a for native layout #70682
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Don't use a fixed listening port for the proxy #70681
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix SOS tests on 7.0 #70677
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implement digest one shots for browser implementation #70672
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Remove dead code. #70671
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #70668
    area-Serialization
  • Use new byte[] span optimization in a few more places #70665
    area-Meta
  • Unix: Move 'FileNotFound to DirectoryNotFound' handling to GetExceptionForIoErrno. #70661
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Unpin locals, attempt 2 #70655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement Vector128 version of System.Buffers.Text.Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 #70654
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Interop.IOErrors: remove errorRewriter arg. #70652
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix SpanHelpers.Reverse regression #70650
    area-System.Memory
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Assertion prop fix #70643
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Improve distribution of CoseHeaderLabel hash codes #70695
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #70299
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.x
  • Handle mis-sized structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize expansion of indir cell addresses for CFG #70491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Build WasmAppHost with UseAppHost=false #70606
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use the signature types when building ABI info #70635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Re-enable previously failing tests - System.IO.FileSystem #70594
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO
  • Use hash one-shots for key adjustment in HMACCommon #70639
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][wasm] Enable a subset of the gc_pin area optimizations. #70465
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Avoid falling back to the interpreter for generic delegate invocation #70653
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add DeleteFromJsonAsync extension for HttpClient #65619
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Enable CSE for CLS/STR const handles #70580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add architecture enum PPC64le #68809
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-ppc64le
  • ppc64le build support #68806
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Remove unused code and use Win SDK COM headers instead of checked in versions. #70638
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1820930 #70596
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable HMAC on Browser WASM #70442
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Revert "? true : false" removal in ArraySortHelper.cs #70631
    area-System.Collections
  • Add fake server test for Negotiate authentication. #70396
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Revert "Unpin locals (dotnet#70264)" #70627
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Fixes resource warning on a HW app #70356
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Precisely track reflected on fields #70546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Narrow cast fix #70518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix Assembly.LoadFrom resolver #70537
    Servicing-consider, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for per-project customization of helix work items #70461
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Harden for null byrefs #70317
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add doc on Unix temporary file security practice #70585
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Enable JitConsumeProfileForCasts by default #69869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support long pdata unwinding and save_next for floating point regs in ARM64 #69906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add UseSystemd() and UseWindowsService() IServiceCollection extension methods #68580
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm] Enable some previously failing WBT/AOT tests on windows #70595
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • List other architectures in dotnet --info #70403
    area-Host
  • Add SlidingWindow and FixedWindow to RateLimitPartition #68782
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder.Bind on virtual properties duplicates elements #70592
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Cross module r2r rebased #70581
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add two new stages to prepare for our new custom type marshalling design. #70598
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • EventLogException is missing the original win32 error code #70629
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • Add Ubuntu 22.04 to libraries CI run #67345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix async handle leak when sync RandomAccess read/write on async handle fails #70591
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.x
  • Gather 'Tellurium' team issues in team project #68193
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Obsolete AssemblyName.CodeBase, AssemblyName.EscapedCodeBase #70534
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Implement System.Buffers.Text.Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 for Arm64 #70336
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-ILVerification, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert exception help context parsing to managed #70251
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add AVX2 SIMD code paths for ASCIIUtility #70120
    community-contribution
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Allow `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` on the RHS of block copies #70633
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 round I #70417
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reenable C4244 in repo #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Add end-to-end test for NTLM/Negotiate authentication against fake server #70630
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr, arch-ppc64le
  • JSON contract customization #70435
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Support `PUTARG_STK(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on ARM/64 #70256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Reduce allocations when using DataContractSerializer with SurrogateTypes #70620
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Refactor how implicit byrefs are morphed #70243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle mis-sized structs in ARM/64 `PUTARG_SPLIT` codegen #70249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GTF_ASSERTION_PROP_LONG` #70521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Restore ArchivingUtils.AttemptSetLastWriteTime #70617
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid throwing Win32Exception from HTTP authentication #70474
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Enable IlcTrimMetadata by default #70201
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimize `i % 2` #70599
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add icon to dotnet.exe on Windows #70578
    area-Host
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Rooting `GT_COMMA` nodes #69918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Future
  • ARM64 - Add GT_CHK_DIV_BY_ZERO #69170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add unit tests for PackageValidation and ApiCompatibilty types #25990
  • Package validators might enqueue identical work items #25989

Closed

  • dotnet publish won't publish/build #25965

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the default to Release for Pack/Pub in command building #25991
    Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25957
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Support suppressions without a diagnostic id #25938
    Area-Compatibility
  • Ensure the Razor generator doesn't generate when it's suppressed #25833
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add --skip-sign-check option to repair, uninstall, and update #25834
    Area-Workloads
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Self Constraint #5413
    Likely Never

PullRequests

Created

  • Update static-abstracts-in-interfaces.md based on the latest LDM decisions #6216

Merged

  • Update title case #6208
  • Fix typo in LDM-2022-01-12.md #6215

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LINQ range variable types are forced to be non-nullable no matter what is assigned #61863
  • EditorConfig UI shouldn't include roaming-only code-style options #61860
  • `FadeOutComplexCollectionInitialization` is not initialized nor read #61859
  • `AbstractMatchFolderAndNamespaceDiagnosticAnalyzer` doesn't bail out for `PreferNamespaceAndFolderMatchStructure` #61858
    17.4
  • `PreferSystemHashCode` is not set #61857
  • Have a way to make sure VS code-style options UI is up to date #61856
  • Re-work AutomationObject design #61855
  • New public APIs for Unsigned Right Shift #61854
  • CompilationWithAnalyzer.GetAnalyzerDiagnosticsAsync returns 0 diagnostics even though the analyzers do run & report #61851
    17.3
  • IDisposable analyzer #61850
  • New public APIs for UTF8 String Literals #61847
  • New public APIs for Checked User-defined Operators #61846
  • [Regression]: Setting code-style options severity via `Tools` → `Options` has no effect #61844
    17.3
  • checked expression containing switch expression has no effect #61843

Closed

  • Inconsistency around accessibility checks for interface implementations #60885
    C# 11.0
  • Warning to programmer about sync Task return in c# #61625
    Backlog
  • CSharp Style - Blank Line After Close Brace #61861
  • Adjust implementation of user-defined conversion resolution according to the latest LDM decision #61470
    C# 11.0
  • Require spaces within the enhanced `#line` directive #61663
    17.3
  • Disallow an interface containing or inheriting static abstract/virtual members as a type argument #61461
    C# 11.0
  • VB compiler crashes with `NullReferenceException` in decoding well-known attributes #61492
    Compiler.Next
  • `SyntaxList<TNode>` doesn't return the original nodes when passing an `IEnumerable<TNode>` #61836

PullRequests

Created

  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61869
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1822527 #61868
  • Sort the generated CodeAction telemetry table. #61867
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61866
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61865
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add Asp.net extensibility point for document highlighting. #61864
    Area-IDE
  • Experiment with limits in EndToEndTests.Constraints #61852
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Simplify embedded language export system. #61862
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61849
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Report an error for an implicit implementation of an inaccessible interface members #61717
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1811661 #61735
  • Fix BuildActionTelemetryTable tool #61795
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61758
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update document highlighting to follow new pattern for embedded language extensibility. #61817
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adjust implementation of user-defined conversion resolution according to the latest LDM decision #61754
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Use the complete branch name in DartLab yml #61821
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, Next
  • Simplify export attribute for embedded language features #61853
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Require spaces within line span directives and relax LangVer check #61686
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Organize contributing notes and add WSL testing section #61408
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Disallow an interface containing or inheriting static abstract/virtual members without implementation as a type argument #61775
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Fix VB compiler crashes when decoding attributes #61537
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61871
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61870
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Polish async suggestions #61840
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Add support for reporting project level diagnostics in workspace pull #61819
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE
  • Enable .Net Core OOP by default #60163
    Area-IDE
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers
  • IOperation: expose information about the type parameter that is going to be used as the ".constrained" type for invoking abstract static methods #61811
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • 🚧 Support renaming symbols when the editor tries to fix a spell checking mistake. #61802
    Area-IDE
  • Serializable option set #61839
    Area-IDE
  • Unwrap the cause (inner exception) of operation canceled exceptions when reporting faults #61787
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements in VB #61569
    Area-Compilers
  • Change ServiceHub host names #60778
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #61669
    Area-IDE
  • Calculate containing type effective accessibility for required member enforcement #61643
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Merge semantic snippets into main #61658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix invalid cast when removing unreachable code in top-level programs #61830
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #42174
  • Introduce top-level API on WebApplicationBuilder for configuring Authorization #42172
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Support config-based options for different authentication schemes #42170
    7.0-preview6
  • Support authenticate attribute to specify authN schemes for controllers or method #42163
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.6.22310.18] https://localhost:5001 is not listened for Asp.Net Core apps that use Https #42161

Closed

  • optimize the startup name in the project template #42162
  • Add `IAuthenticationConfigurationProvider.GetAuthenticationConfiguration` #41989
    7.0-preview6
  • Update project templates to use DateOnly instead of DateTime where appropriate #38075
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Collection Data Binding In Blazor Server #42124
  • SPA Proxy works in an unintuitive way #42156
  • Re-enable binary logs #32909
  • [Blazor WASM] UserOptions not bound when published #41998

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Redo yarn install #42177
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add generic method overloads to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results static class #42176
    area-runtime
  • [release/3.1] Redo `yarn install` #42173
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Remove generation of schemas in OpenAPI package #42169
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Add support for reading default scheme from config #41987
    area-security, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix CompGov alert #42171
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview6
  • Update project templates to replace DateTime with DateOnly #42084
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Observe changes in internal class #8005
  • TapGestureRecognizer does not work in label's span #8004
  • InvalidOperationException: VisualStateGroup Names must be unique #8003
  • Unable to build iOS Binding Library wrapping iOS Framework Native Reference #8000
  • ToPlatformException in MauiCustomRenderer sample app #7999
  • TableView Intent seems not to have any effect on layout #7998
  • Resizetizer does not respect splash screen alias #7990
  • Readonly Editor cannot show multiple lines on Android #7989
    6.0-servicing
  • SplashScreen does not regenerate after changing properties (Color/ForegroundScale) #7988
  • Android app icons with just a single image (no ForegroundFile) do not render #7987
  • Android app icons do not respect foreground scale and tint #7986
  • Build fails if app references library which contains framework library inside #7980
  • [Android/iOS] Scrollview Direction=Both not working with Label as the content #7979
  • ClockPage Refresh of current time clock is stop after some seconds or time #7978
  • Binding NullReferenceException #7977

Closed

  • MAUI Blazor project template should be consistent in indentation type (spaces vs. tabs) #7934
    .NET 7
  • [Spec] Implement DispatchTouchEvent/MEH/InputTransparent inside Core #1190
  • webAuthenticator controller sample uses the wrong name for expires_in #7981
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in Android shell when page becomes invisible #7417
    6.0-sr2
  • doesn't have a target for 'net6.0-windows10.0.19041.0'. Ensure that restore has run and that you have included 'net6.0-windows10.0.19041.0' in the TargetFrameworks for your project. #7790
  • Support visualizer in vscode #3660
  • XAML Editor control issue on .NET MAUI Preview 10 for Android #4264
  • [MacOS] Program not crashing after throwing exception #7923
  • I hate errors so... #7969
  • Maui Splash Screen on Android using wrong svg icon #7772
  • Binding relative source type intellisense only shows classes with default constructor #7608
  • maui blazor app crashes on iphone device just by adding builder.Services.AddSingleton<IConnectivity>(Connectivity.Current) to MauiProgram.cs #7952
  • [WInUI] NullReferneceException on startup #7949
  • Maui-ios Adding appcenter to MAUI default project throws link error in debug #7959
  • Default Template Build Fails #7974

PullRequests

Created

  • Add default `Name=blazorWebView` to MAUI MainPage.xaml #8007
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄
  • Remove RC2 & Preview 14 Development Workload Installation Instructions #8006
  • Explicitly set bounds for iOS ScrollView content holder #8002
    6.0-sr2
  • [android] avoid View.Context where unecessary #8001
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [essentials] use Lazy<T> for Android application-wide values #7996
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0-servicing
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker TextColor property #7995
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix Android adaptive icon generation #7994
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2
  • Regenerate splash screen on changes and respect alias #7993
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix clear button not working on Entry #7992
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr2
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker Format not working #7991
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr2
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22302.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22310.1 #7985
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate.PerformFetch #7982
    .NET 7

Merged

  • Fix `maui-blazor` indentation #7976
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix Essentials WebAuthenticator sample code #7983
    area/essentials 🍞

Updated

  • Automatically add MauiIcon to AndroidManifest.xml #7968
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix issue using gradients in Button with Corner Radius #7666
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0-sr2
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7913
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix issue rendering Brushes binding GradientStop colors #7719
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr2
  • Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core throws InvalidOperationException because [NotMapped] attribute is not declared over a readonly property #28221
  • Move CosmosConventionSetBuilder out of internal apis. #28220
  • If we group on an expression (e.g. a ternary), should the expression be re-used rather than further translated when selected in another expression (e.g. ternary)? #28219
  • Many to Many - Additional Properties #28218
  • Add additional overloads to provider ServiceCollectionExtensions methods. #28217
  • Don't generate unneeded subquery in TPC with OfType #28214
    Backlog

Closed

  • No-Relational Provider #28114
  • regression in efcore 6.0.5 causes crashes when table name starts with a number #28211
  • System.MissingMethodException: Method not found: 'Void Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IMutableForeignKey.set_DeleteBehavior(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DeleteBehavior)' when scaffolding. #28213

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for CSharpHelper for List literals #28212

Updated

  • Add entity-splitting model building support #28156
  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
